author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet) from 2.11.0 to 2.12.0.
Changelog *Sourced from [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights's changelog](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## Version 2.12.0 > - [Fix IndexOutOfRangeException in W3CUtilities.TryGetTraceId](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1327) > - [Fix UpdateRequestTelemetryFromRequest throwing UriFormatException](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1328) > - [Add ETW log for missing Instrumentation Key](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1331) > - [Remove HttpContext lock from AzureAppServiceRoleNameFromHostNameHeaderInitializer](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1340) > > ## Version 2.12.0-beta4 > - [Add support for collecting convention-based Azure SDK activities.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1300) > - [Log4Net includes Message for ExceptionTelemetry](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1315) > - [NLog includes Message for ExceptionTelemetry](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1315) > - [Fix RouteData not set in ASP.Net Core 3.0](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1318) > - [Fix depednency tracking for Microsoft.Azure.EventHubs SDK 4.1.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1317) > > ## Version 2.12.0-beta3 > - [Standard Metric extractor for Dependency) add Dependency.ResultCode dimension.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1233) > > ## Version 2.12.0-beta2 > - [Enable Metric DimensionCapping API for Internal use with standard metric aggregation.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1244) > - [ILogger - Flush TelemetryChannel when the ILoggerProvider is Disposed.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1289) > - [Standard Metric extractor (Request,Dependency) populates all standard dimensions.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1233) > > ## Version 2.12.0-beta1 > - BASE: [New: TelemetryConfiguration now supports Connection Strings]https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1221) > - WEB: [Enhancement to how QuickPulseTelemetryModule shares its ServiceEndpoint with QuickPulseTelemetryProcessor.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet-server/pull/1266) > - WEB: [QuickPulse will support SDK Connection String](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1221) > - WEB: [Add support for storing EventCounter Metadata as properties of MetricTelemetry](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet-server/issues/1287) > - WEB: [New RoleName initializer for Azure Web App to accurately populate RoleName.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet-server/issues/1207) > - NETCORE: Skipping version numbers to keep in sync with Base SDK. > - NETCORE: [Fix Null/Empty Ikey from ApplicationInsightsServiceOptions overrding one from appsettings.json](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-aspnetcore/issues/989) > - NETCORE: [Provide ApplicationInsightsServiceOptions for easy disabling of any default TelemetryModules](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-aspnetcore/issues/988) > - NETCORE: [Added support for SDK Connection String](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1221) > - NETCORE: [New RoleName initializer for Azure Web App to accurately populate RoleName.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet-server/issues/1207) > - NETCORE: Update to Base/Web/Logging SDK to 2.12.0-beta1 > > ---------- > # Before 2.12.0, our SDKs had separate repositories. > ----------
Commits - [`da00d03`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/da00d03d196251699b72b95eed429a802e31a737) Merge pull request [#1490](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1490) from microsoft/develop - [`376eb5b`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/376eb5b1c1e9a84b49d845a08a69387890604709) bump version 2.12 stable ([#1489](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1489)) - [`10d8399`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/10d839936fc7b95769fbdcd85511b327b6ffc69e) Reenable deepclone tests. update compare object nuget version ([#1487](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1487)) - [`693081b`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/693081b1b743c27ce935afad8f8fea2733c51c12) merge github templates and move to root ([#1488](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1488)) - [`6eef48b`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/6eef48bdcee298ffb40d561016fb46bd8ea00c4a) Even if a telemetry module is disabled, its still added to DI ([#1485](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1485)) - [`467c661`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/467c66192df258395d649467755ee3c171141b3e) remove httpcontext from rolename initializer ([#1340](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1340)) - [`8e9c396`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/8e9c3964be6ea989276cb290905836749aee4671) add etw log for missing instrumentation key ([#1331](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1331)) - [`eaa6b77`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/eaa6b778543d60dfebedbd6b71e1f8088cfad0a1) fix UpdateRequestTelemetryFromRequest throwing UriFormatException ([#1329](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1329)) - [`e345207`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/e345207a9720e3c63ec7350da3445c6ae067c3a5) Fix IndexOutOfRange in W3CUtilities.TryParseTraceId ([#1327](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1327)) - [`89d3d63`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/89d3d6398301435361f7749222ef987c443c12d8) Merge pull request [#1324](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1324) from microsoft/develop - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/compare/2.11.0...2.12.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.11.0&new-version=2.12.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.11.0&new-version=2.12.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired)

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
<!--[AutoMerge]-->
Hello @adityapatwardhan!

Because this pull request has the `AutoMerge` label, I will be glad to assist with helping to merge this pull request once all check-in policies pass.

Do note that I've been instructed to only help merge pull requests of this repository that have been opened for at least **24 hours**, a condition that will be fulfilled in about 4 hours 2 minutes. No worries though, I will be back when the time is right! :wink:

##### p.s. you can customize the way I help with merging this pull request, such as holding this pull request until a specific person approves. Simply @mention me (`@msftbot`) and give me an instruction to get started! Learn more [here](https://github.com/OfficeDev/office-ui-fabric-react/wiki/Advanced-auto-merge).

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:`v7.0.0-rc.1` has been released which incorporates this pull request.:tada:

title: Bump Microsoft.ApplicationInsights from 2.11.0 to 2.12.0
